nodes.text: Spohn was a Lieutenant Commander who served under Commodore Kyrsta Agate on the starship Concord. Spohn served during the Battle of Jakku in 5 ABY. When their starship was damaged by the Star Destroyer Punishment, Fleet Admiral Gial Ackbar ordered Agate and her crew to abandon ship. While the crew evacuated the ship, Agate decided to launch a frontal attack on the Ravager with all her ship's firepower and arsenal. Spohn was the last member who evacuated from the Concord.
